### Evolution
- `/CHAIN-ALL-COMMANDS`
- `/analyze-custom-files` - Analyze Claude-related configuration across:
- `/auto-chain`
- `/auto-design` - Run the auto design analyzer to gather a comprehensive snapshot of system state and suggested design changes.
- `/auto-evolve` - Run an automated self-evolution generation using your contract and evolution bundle.
- `/auto-pipeline` - Run a full improvement loop in one command:
- `/auto-recursive-chain-ai` - Auto-recursive, looping, chaining AI orchestrator that automatically chains all slash commands in recursive loops with intelligent decision-making.
- `/autorun-all` - Continuously run the full auto-evolution loop (generation + summary + design analysis) according to the self-evolution contract.
- `/chaos-evolve`
- `/check-drift` - ** Early detection of configuration inconsistencies before they cause production issues
- `/config-diff` - **
- `/contract-adapt` - Inspect and optionally adapt the self-evolution contract based on recent generations.
- `/deep-research`
- `/e2e-playwright` - Run the advanced Playwright E2E + visual testing suite.
- `/e2e-smoke` - Run a fast end-to-end smoke test across core tools (analysis, healing, junk scan, RAG).
- `/evolution-status` - Report the current health and evolution status of the Claude + Codex system.
- `/evolution-summary` - Show a concise summary of the most recent auto-evolution generation.
- `/generation`
- `/health-probe` - Run a health snapshot of the Claude + Nexus stack and get a simple pass/fail based on fitness.
- `/hive`
- `/innovation-scan` - Generate an innovation report with suggested experiments and upgrades.
- `/mega-auto`
- `/meshive`
- `/multi-ai-orchestrate` - Coordinate an evolution cycle across Claude, Codex, and GPT-4.
- `/production-dashboard` - Show a consolidated production dashboard for the Claude + Codex system.

- `/self-evolve`

- `/destiny`
- `/e2e-smoke` - Run a fast end-to-end smoke test across core tools (analysis, healing, junk scan, RAG).
- `/evolution-summary` - Show a concise summary of the most recent auto-evolution generation.
- `/fusion`
- `/generation`
- `/hive`
- `/hypersense`
- `/intent-map` - Summarize recent Claude chat history into thematic buckets (projects/tools, research, bugs, TODOs, etc.).
- `/meshive`
- `/multi-websearch` - Use Claude in multiple parallel sessions (or tabs) to perform wide, deep web research on a topic and then merge the findings into a single synthesis.
- `/neural-pin`
- `/nexus-think`
- `/pattern-analyze`
- `/perf-rag` - Measure RAG query latency and enforce a simple performance threshold.
- `/project-index` - Build a high-level index of all top-level projects under `D:\` and write it to `D:\MASTER_INDEX\project_index.json`.
- `/rag-build-index` - Build a TF-IDF + LSA index over the prepared RAG documents for fast semantic search.
- `/rag-prepare` - Build a RAG corpus from research documents under `.claude` and `MASTER_INDEX`.
- `/rag-query` - Query the local RAG index built from your research documents.
- `/recursive-prompt`
- `/sbom` - Generate a simple local SBOM (software bill of materials) for Rust and Python components.
- `/suggest-chain`
- `/tag`
- `/tag-query`
- `/ultra-critic`
- `/ultramind-x13`

### Utility
- `/fix-encoding-errors` - Run the encoding self-healer against the runtime Claude directory to reduce or eliminate encoding-related errors.
- `/junk-scan` - Recursively scan `D:\` and heuristically identify candidate junk files and folders (temporary, build artefacts, large logs).
